name: Bill Shot
description:
A Red Square Attacking You, Luckily You Have Your Trusty gun. Shoot As Mush Bill You Can

Theres 3 Type Of Bill:

-Normal Bill

-Red Bill( Follow You Arround)

-Under Bill(Under You)

And Don't Die

Control:

A - Left

D - Right

W- Jump

Click- Shoot

Q- Slide left

E- Slide Right
